name: One Dice Two Die
description:
One Dice Two Die comes with two game modes: Single and Multiplayer-versus

Single Player: 

Play as one character. Rolling the die not only determines the number of steps you can take, but also the range of your attacks. You are not able to return to the previous block. After finish moving, You attack, and then repeat. 

Furthermore, Stars provide 1 additional move (but think twice before taking them, as they may turn out unhelpful...).

Your aim is to eliminate all gray triangles from the map. There are currently 4 maps in total. Enjoy!

Multiplayer - versus:

Play with your friends! Same rules apply for multiplayer but now you take turns!

Your aim is to eliminate your friend before they do you. Enjoy!

Controls:

WASD or Arrows:

move

Space:

roll die

M:

return to main menu
